title: Challenging Cryptic Crossword 7
description: This crossword is made more difficult by the obscurity and esotericity of many of the words being clued. Good luck!

clues.clue: Go off a country
I drink, mostly after a saloon, for a tick - it's deadly
At the end, river current turned around in two different ways, making you repeat from the beginning
Redundancy for some people on a smallholding
Old spit sample is cleaned off and reused
Children's author makes lentil dish
Hormone a scan found before the end of the month
The Queen, in Great Britain, came back following poorly chosen musician
Ho ho, can he possibly consume the tail of a lizard for the master?
For instance, a dog, primarily created by God
Guide spoke of truth and existence
Space-marine mammals swap left and right, they can make you feel happy
Epic and long-mashed soybeans have one vitamin replaced with another
Before the morning, between the borders of Tibet, the wizard returned to make flatbreads
Trees seen in wild-ass safaris, in which I was not included
Outer castle is involved in mysterious tale
Pose for cameras: an audience, essentially
Sacred text is kind of diaphanous, but without any holes
Get me fresh peaches
Wander around short end, and get turning inert gas up (safety first!) for X-ray images
Can I dine holding a fox, perhaps?
Rhapsody composed about me in state of unhappiness
After the cold, a dry spell nearly affected device measuring water for a time
Accent from Inverness is rather backward
Write music unaided to calm down
Around burrow, mid-sized area reveals a very flowery passage
It's helpful, vaguely, to be the initally lacking jerk
Among beaten drums
